title: President Trump Restores Confidence in the American Economy – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
March 31, 2017
We’re going to win economically; we’re going to win with the economy.
						Donald J. Trump					BUILDING CONFIDENCE IN THE AMERICAN ECONOMY: Since President Donald J. Trump’s election, economic indicators have responded with record confidence to his pro-growth agenda.EARLY PROGRESS: In just the first full month of President Trump’s Administration, the United States economy has already made promising strides in the job market.IMPLEMENTING JOB CREATING POLICIES: President Trump is executing an agenda that favors the American worker.CUTTING GOVERNMENT RED TAPE: President Trump has quickly taken steps to get the Government out of the way of job creation.PARTNER OF THE PRIVATE SECTOR: President Trump has worked hand-in-hand with the private sector to get companies re-investing in America.FOLLOWING THROUGH FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE: President Trump campaigned on jumpstarting the economic engine of America so businesses could grow and Americans could get back to work.
